answerText: pituitary gland [10] The pituitary gland also secretes a hormone that stimulates this other lobed gland located in the throat. Iodine deficiency causes it to swell up.
heading: Collegiate Novice |2012 | 10 | 3 | Science | Biology | College
subject: Science
question: Question: This gland's anterior lobe produces growth hormone and prolactin, while its posterior region secretes oxytocin.  [10] Name this "master gland," which is attached to the brain by a stalk.
